title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-1 - Andy Dalton Is More Similar To Dak Prescott Than You Think
itunes:title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-1 - Andy Dalton Is More Similar To Dak Prescott Than You Think
description:
Colin discusses the possibility of the Cowboys making the playoffs and the difference between back up QB Andy Dalton and Dak Prescott. He also celebrates LeBron James’s birthday and what makes him different than Michael Jordan. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to tell Colin why he’s crazy for having Patrick Mahomes 3rd in the MVP race. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
